custsupdesc:
Toll free: 800MOF (800663)
 International: +971 2 495 1000

 The dedicated e-Dirham G2 Call Centre is available 24x7 and provides support in three languages: English, Arabic and Urdu.
 
 You will be able to perform the following:

custsuplst.suplst: Inquire about your e-Dirham card balance and transactions made on the card
Obtain guidance and information about the e-Dirham system
Other queries and follow ups (using your Issue ID numbers)

smsp:
SMS notifications of transactions made on the e-Dirham G2 cards for registered customers (subject to availability in both English and Arabic) 
 
 24/7 e-Dirham and NBAD ATMs/CDMs across the UAE 
 
 You will be able to perform the following:

smslst.smslist: Set Passcode/ Change Passcode / Reset Passcode
Load and Reload your e-Dirham G2 cards

g2webp:
You need to have set your Passcode to be able to access all the functionalities of the e-Dirham G2 website.
 
  Please see the section related to "Passcode" for guidance.
 
 By accessing the e-Dirham G2 Website, you will be able to:

g2weblst.g2weblist: Obtain guidance and information about the e-Dirham system
Inquire about your e-Dirham card balance and transactions made on the card
Apply online for the Gold Al Haslah Card
Initiate the Red Al Haslah Card full registration process
Short register your e-Dirham G2 cards.
Request for Point of Sale Terminals (Will be available soon for e-Dirham G2 merchants)
